text:

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: resetting P2 open bugs to P3 pending further review
please provide test input FO file (and any referenced image files) and output PDF file that demonstrates the problem
creator: gadams@apache.org

text: also provide info on how this is a regression; in the mean time, am resetting severity to normal
creator: gadams@apache.org

text:
(In reply to comment #4)
> also provide info on how this is a regression; in the mean time, am resetting
> severity to normal

Jeremy, I am still awaiting your input as requested above (and also in comment #3). if I see no further input by April 30, I will close this bug due to lack of requested information. Regards, Glenn
creator: gadams@apache.org
philvarner@gmail.com
text: This appears to be an issue with PNGs _without_ and alpha channel in 0.95.  Verified that this issue does not exist in 1.0.  Please close as you please.
thank you for the hint but can you provide an example image that shows the issue? I was never able to see the problem with the image originally provided.
creator: lmpmbernardo@gmail.com
